Detailed Description

Cell in the Qt Graphics framework.

Draw a cell item in the graphics view. Can change color, orientation (angle), length and can be selected (by emitting the focus gained/lost events).

void GraphicsCell::duplicateCell ( GraphicsCell *  newCell,
double  cellLength0 
)

Duplicate cell and return a pointer to the daughter cell.

Allocation of the new cell is not managed by this method. Daughter cell should be allocated before calling this method and its pointer passed as argument.

Reimplemented in GraphicsCellODE.

void GraphicsCell::setPos ( qreal  x,
qreal  y 
) [virtual]

Overloaded version: set the position of GraphicsCell object, warning: coordinates in argument should be in normal system.

Remark: method is private in order to prevent confusion with the different coordinate system. Cell position can only be changed from the GraphicsCellScene class.

Reimplemented in GraphicsCellODE.

void GraphicsCell::computeCellShape (  )  [private]

Compute the cell shape from the parameters cellLength_ and cellHeight_.

The cell shape is a cylinder with spherical caps.
